Key.Original:
%1 has been caught trying to spawn AI '%2'
Please report this player to an admin as soon as possible.

Thank you for joining our server! We look forward to seeing you roleplay here, but before you get started, please take a few minutes to read our rules so you won't run into any trouble. If you're new to Altis Life and need some help or just the basics answered, then check our guide.

We have an <t color='%1'>active admin team</t> which do their best to keep our players happy and supply our players with new content. We have some <t color='%1'>unique features</t> on this server which you won't find on any other Altis Life server out there, our server is also <t color='%1'>optimized</t> to provide less desync and better framerates than the usual Altis Life experience.
Perk system based on your level
Custom gang bases for the biggest gangs
Custom anti-cheat and script kiddie protection

Our <t color='%1'>community</t> is what keeps us going and is the <t color='%1'>heart of our server</t>. If you're a new player or you've been with us for some time, here are some additional steps you may want to take to <t color='%1'>get yourself involved</t> with our <t color='%1'>community</t>.
Teamspeak - We provide a Teamspeak server so you can communicate with your friends, acquaintances or even complete strangers! Join our Teamspeak here.
Forums - Our forums are there for you to stay up to date with the latest news and events, tell us what's on your mind or simply just say hello! Register on our forums here.
With the release of the Marksmen DLC and it's features such as weapons resting and deployment, we've decided to <t color='%1'>trial</t> a couple of somewhat <t color='%1'>controversial changes</t>.

The first change we have a vote for before it's implemented, is the <t color='%1'>removal</t> of <t color='%1'>3rd person</t> camera when the player is on foot (will still be available when inside vehicles). The main reason behind this change is to prevent potentially exploitive methods of gameplay while also enforcing a <t color='%1'>richer combat experience</t>.
We're giving our players the oppurtinity to decide the overall outcome of this change, so please cast your vote here.

The second change being made is the removal of redbull from the game. Players will now have to take their equipment load into consideration as it will directly affect their fatigue when moving.
A guide is in the works to help you manage your equipment load and fatigue effectively, so stay tuned on the forums!

Greetings everyone! It's Easter time so I'll be handing out some special rewards to some lucky individuals. Come and find me inside pink circle marked on the map to claim your special Easter reward. It's first come first serve, so good luck! Please keep in mind that relogging to spawn closer to the zone is against the server rules.
%1 has claimed a reward from the treasure hunt! Don't worry though, I'll be handing out more rewards in 20 minutes.
You have received £%1 for your services
Insufficient funds available from your bank account to reset perks

%1 has buried the remains of one of the tortured souls. For this, the island's fog will be dispersed until the next soul appears.
Well done to %1!
The silent alarm for the %1 has been triggered!
There must be at least %1 Police or NATO online.
There must be at least %1 Police online.
There must be at least %1 NATO online.
The vault door must be unlocked.

%1
Legal licenses can be purchased at Licensing Agencies and illegal licenses at Rebel Outposts.

The silent alarm for the %1 petrol station has been triggered.
CCTV has identified the robber as a member of the %2 gang.

If a helicopter is destroyed, it is removed permanently from your garage and will no longer be available to you.

Are you sure you want to buy this helicopter?
This type of vehicle can only store oil, natural gas and propane.

Rented vehicles are not persistent and will not be available after the server restarts.

Are you sure you want to rent this vehicle?

Cargo containers are immobile and cannot be moved without sling loading using a helicopter.

Are you sure you want to buy this container?
Are you sure you want to <t color='#ff0000'>permanently delete</t> your %1?
%1 tried to use explosives without the necessary training.
%1 has switched to group camera view (%2).
Crime rates are rising in Altis, do you think you could make a difference? The APC are recruiting more officers to help keep your streets safe. Apply now at www.grandtheftarma.com!

You have entered a green zone.
It is illegal to carry a weapon or wear a mask inside this zone.

Aircraft loitering or attempting to land inside this zone without permission may result in destruction without warning
You are no longer inside a green zone.

You have entered a no fly zone.
Aircraft loitering or attempting to land inside or near this zone without permission may result in destruction without warning.
A <t font='PuristaBold'>%1</t> has been reported flying in the vicinity of the Altis Oil Rig.
Level <t font='PuristaBold'>%1</t> is required to purchase this license.

You are missing one or more of the required materials.

The required materials needed to process at least one unit are:
%1
A <t font='PuristaBold'>%1</t> is required to process here. Legal licenses can be purchased at Licensing Agencies and illegal licenses at Rebel Outposts.
<t font='PuristaBold'>%1</t> has wire transfered you <t font='PuristaBold'>£%2</t>.
If you have received a large sum of money anonymously, then please contact an admin immediately or you may be subject to a permanent ban.

You cannot transfer less than:
£10,000

You cannot transfer more than:
£999,999
Are you sure you want to send £<t font='PuristaBold'>%1</t> to <t font='PuristaBold'>%2</t>?

3rd person camera is only available if you are the driver of a vehicle or inside green zones.

This change is on trial until the 25/09/2015.

Your communications have been seized.

You must now cease all communication both inside and outside of the game with anyone that is not within talking distance. Failing to do this is considered 'Fail RP' and is a bannable offense.

Key.Original: You can now run farther for 3 minutes
Key.English: You can now run farther for 3 minutes

Key.Original: You already have a Spike Strip active in deployment
Key.English: You already have a Spike Strip active in deployment

Key.Original: You can't refuel the vehicle while in it!
Key.English: You can't refuel the vehicle while in it!

Key.Original: You need to stay within 10m to process.
Key.English: You need to stay within 10m to process.

Key.Original: You need £%1 to process without a license!
Key.English: You need £%1 to process without a license!

Key.Original: %1 has revived you and a fee of £%2 was taken from your bank account for their services.
Key.English: %1 has revived you and a fee of £%2 was taken from your bank account for their services.

Key.Original: Someone else is already reviving this person
Key.English: Someone else is already reviving this person

Key.Original: This person either respawned or was already revived.
Key.English: This person either respawned or was already revived.

Key.Original: You have revived %1 and received £%2 for your services.
Key.English: You have revived %1 and received £%2 for your services.

Key.Original: You got to far away from the body.
Key.English: You got to far away from the body.

Key.Original: The robbery has failed due to unknown reasons
Key.English: The robbery has failed due to unknown reasons

Key.Original: £%1 was stolen from the robbery on the federal reserve
Key.English: £%1 was stolen from the robbery on the federal reserve

Key.Original: This vault is already being robbed by someone else
Key.English: This vault is already being robbed by someone else

Key.Original: This vault was already robbed recently
Key.English: This vault was already robbed recently

Key.Original: Automatically reveals nearest objects within 15m, turn this setting off if you are experiencing performance issues.
Key.English: Automatically reveals nearest objects within 15m, turn this setting off if you are experiencing performance issues.

Key.Original: Controls whether or not players will have name tags above their head.
Key.English: Controls whether or not players will have name tags above their head.

Key.Original: Sending request to server for player information UID [%1]
Key.English: Sending request to server for player information UID [%1]

Key.Original: The server didn't find any player information matching your UID, attempting to add player to system.
Key.English: The server didn't find any player information matching your UID, attempting to add player to system.

Key.Original: There was an error in trying to setup your client.
Key.English: There was an error in trying to setup your client.

Key.Original: You have already used the sync option, you can only use this feature once every 5 minutes.
Key.English: You have already used the sync option, you can only use this feature once every 5 minutes.

Key.Original: Because of some cheater corrupting the BIS MP Framework they have stopped you from enjoying our mission.\n\nYou can try this again in a minute if you feel it is a mistake.
Key.English: Because of some cheater corrupting the BIS MP Framework they have stopped you from enjoying our mission.\n\nYou can try this again in a minute if you feel it is a mistake.

Key.Original: Syncing player information to the server.\n\nPlease wait up to 60 seconds before leaving.
Key.English: Syncing player information to the server.\n\nPlease wait up to 60 seconds before leaving.

Key.Original: Please sync your data manually now, to make sure that you won't lose the license!
Key.English: Please sync your data manually now, to make sure that you won't lose the license!

Key.Original: Because you robbed the bank you can't use the ATM for 5 minutes.
Key.English: Because you robbed the bank you can't use the ATM for 5 minutes.

Key.Original: You didn't choose the clothes you wanted to buy.
Key.English: You didn't choose the clothes you wanted to buy.

Key.Original: Sorry sir, you don't have enough money to buy those clothes.
Key.English: Sorry sir, you don't have enough money to buy those clothes.

Key.Original: There are no vehicles near to sell.
Key.English: There are no vehicles near to sell.

Key.Original: There was a problem opening the chop shop menu.
Key.English: There was a problem opening the chop shop menu.

Key.Original: You need to be a civilian to use this store!
Key.English: You need to be a civilian to use this store

Key.Original: You need to be a cop to use this store!
Key.English: You need to be a cop to use this store!

Key.Original: You don't have rebel training yet!
Key.English: You don't have rebel training yet!

Key.Original: You don't have the jet license yet!
Key.English: You don't have the jet license yet!

Key.Original: You don't have the pilot license yet!
Key.English: You don't have the pilot license yet!

Key.Original: You need a Diving license to use this shop!
Key.English: You need a Diving license to use this shop!

Key.Original: You need a %1 to buy from this shop!
Key.English: You need a %1 to buy from this shop!

Key.Original: There is currently a car there.
Key.English: There is currently a car there.

Key.Original: You do not have enough money on you or in your bank to get your car back.
Key.English: You do not have enough money on you or in your bank to get your car back.

Key.Original: You did not pick a vehicle!
Key.English: You did not pick a vehicle!

Key.Original: You do not have enough cash to purchase this vehicle.\n\nAmount Lacking: £%1
Key.English: You do not have enough cash to purchase this vehicle.\n\nAmount Lacking: £%1

Key.Original: You do not have the required license!
Key.English: You do not have the required license!

Key.Original: There is a vehicle currently blocking the spawn point
Key.English: There is a vehicle currently blocking the spawn point

Key.Original: You are not allowed to use this shop!
Key.English: You are not allowed to use this shop!

Key.Original: You need to select an item to buy.
Key.English: You need to select an item to buy.

Key.Original: You didn't enter an actual number
Key.English: You didn't enter an actual number

Key.Original: You don't have that many items to sell!
Key.English: You don't have that many items to sell!

Key.Original: The gang has enough funds to pay for this, would you like to pay with the gangs funds or your own?
Key.English: The gang has enough funds to pay for this, would you like to pay with the gangs funds or your own?

Key.Original: Pay with cash or gang funds
Key.English: Pay with cash or gang funds

Key.Original: You bought %1 %2 for £%3 with the gangs funds
Key.English: You bought %1 %2 for £%3 with the gangs funds

Key.Original: You need to select an item to buy/sell.
Key.English: You need to select an item to buy/sell.

Key.Original: You bought a %1 for <t color='#8cff9b'>£%2</t> with the gangs funds.
Key.English: You bought a %1 for <t color='#8cff9b'>£%2</t> with the gangs funds.

Key.Original: You will receive your next paycheck in %1 minutes
Key.English: You will receive your next paycheck in %1 minutes

Key.Original: You have missed a paycheck because you were dead.
Key.English: You have missed a paycheck because you were dead.

Key.Original: You have received a paycheck of £%1
Key.English: You have received a paycheck of £%1
